snippet: Jami Attenberg, author of the novel “The Middlesteins,” and Samuel D. Hunter, whose play “The Whale” is at Playwrights Horizons, talk about why they created protagonists who are obese.
abstract: Jami Attenberg, author of novel The Middlesteins, and Samuel D Hunter, whose play The Whale is at Playwrights Horizons, talk about why they created protagonists who are obese.
lead_paragraph: Jami Attenberg, author of the novel “The Middlesteins,” and Samuel D. Hunter, whose play “The Whale” is at Playwrights Horizons, talk about why they created protagonists who are obese.

headline.seo: Obesity, With Jami Attenberg and Samuel D. Hunter
headline.main: Characters Who Take Up More Than Their Share of Room in the Family
headline.print_headline: The Power of Memory And Its Influence On Obese Characters
